text: Apache Skies is a four-issue comic book limited series, published in 2002 by Marvel Comics as a part of that company's MAX imprint. The series was written by John Ostrander and drawn by Leonardo Manco. The series was a sequel to 2000s Blaze of Glory. ==Plot summary== After the death of the Apache Kid, the Rawhide Kid joins forces with the new Apache Kid to find the killer. ==Collected editions== It was published in a collected trade paperback as Apache Skies () in 2002. ==Notes== ==References== * * Category:Comics by John Ostrander
title: Apache Skies
